data.text: Hiwa thengnga lairalak ah inlak inthang inkhat aleisuok. Numeisa inkhat kani kha retruo minchangnga inluk, tha kha akeii nuoiya om halli arsi soomleini kha alu ah alukhim minchang.
Numeisanu kha nai aleiwon halli nai neisik hongtung pha kanakhan aleichap.
Leiilaak inlak inkhat lairalak ah aleisuoknook. Akasen saraikhuo inthang inkhat aleiom, alu sari eii araki soom eii halli alu rakip ah renglukhu inkhu. Dan 7:7

Aramei kalek-ah lairalak ah kaom arsi semthumma semkhat ngaikha nuoipil chungnga juozeemthaak. Numeisanu khan nai neili neimak ijuonei nai kha eisik tia saraikhuo khan numeisanu ma-ah ngirra aleiom. Dan 8:10

Khawa phakhan numeisanu in zaat rakip chungnga thirkherol thota wai karoonsik sapasal inkhat aleinei. Takkha nai pasal kha inkasut ah Pathian khat-um ama reng in-ongna muntiang inleiruoijei. Isa 66:7; Suok 2:9
Numeisanu kha Pathian in iboolpi neelram muntiang aleitaan, khawa munkhan nikhuo lisingkhat rajani le soomruk (1,260) numeisanu kha katha tak-ah ompui nasik-ah iboolpi mun eii.

Hiwa thengnga marwaanna raal aleisuok, Michael khat-um ama marwaan tirton ngai'n saraikhuo chungnga raal inleitho, halli saraikhuo khat-um ama marwaan tirton ngai innum raal kha inleidei; Dan 10:13; 12:1; Jud 9
takkha saraikhuo chungnga raalkha inleimator, halli saraikhuo li ama marwaan tirton ngaikha marwaanna omsik kha leizootpimujei.

Saraikhuo inthang kha injuodeengjuon, tiallaiya maruul kha eii araming kha Seitan inti, manmasituol pumpui diang maleisei katho. Ama khat-um ama marwaan tirton ngaikha nuoipil chungnga injuodeengjuon. Inphut 3:1; Luk 10:18

Hiwa thengnga marwaan makheiya kei'n rasa inring inkhat in ijuoti kha kaleijet, “Tuun sanminringna kha aheiwajei! Pathian khan Reng ena ranak kha malarjei! Tuun ama Messiah khan wai roonna ranak kha amalarjei! Eini Pathian ma-ah ngirra Pathian kangamna ngaikha suun zaan boiya karilsiat ama kha marwaan makheiya inphut injuodeengjuon jei. Job 1:9-11; Zech 3:1
Inmani'n ama chungnga raal inmator kha Keelngamteii thisen jarra khat-um akadik chongpui inril khan eii; halli inmani'n inringkhuo kapeii khat-um kathi sik-ah leichimu.

Marwaan khat-um marwaanna kaom nangni rakip rokru! Takkha nuoipilchung khat-um tuipui nangni sik achu angtuk chikaomme! Ajarchu Seitan kha nangni diang juojei, ama iraanghek ajarchu ama phahi bongjei tihi ama'n ajetjei.”
Saraikhuo khan marwaan makheiya nuoipil chungnga najuodeengjuon jei tihi aleijet phakhan, ama'n sa pasal kanei numeisanu kha kapuut aleiphut.

Numeisanu kha katha tak-ah ompui nasik inpeii mun neelram khan kumthum le her saraikhuo khan asur matormak nasik-ah murmu inthang murtha inni kha numeisanu diang awuong nasik-ah inleipeii. Dan 7:25; 12:7
Halli saraikhuo khan amur makheiya numeisanu kha tui mintuongpui nasik-ah tuipui kalian aleiphusuok.
Takkha nuoipil khan numeisanu sannasik-ah amur malongnga saraikhuo iheiphusuok tui kha aleimazoopkang.

Saraikhuo khan numeisanu chungnga araangtheiya ama tu-suon ngai rakip chungnga raal katho aleisi, inmani ngai khachu Pathian chongpeii ngai kajui khat-um Jisu'n imalarpi akadik kha kangamna ngaikha in-eii.
Halli saraikhuo khan tuipui khamma aleingir.
